mapper.select: SELECT group_file.fileName,file.fileSize, group_file.id,group_file.parentDirectoryId, file.fileType,file.icon,group_file.absolutePath, group_file.uploadDate FROM group_file INNER JOIN file ON group_file.fileId = file.id where (group_file.absolutePath = #{absolutePath} AND group_file.groupId = #{groupId});

SELECT group_file.fileName,group_file.uploadDate, group_file.id,group_file.parentDirectoryId, group_file.userId,group_file.groupId, group_file.absolutePath,group_file.fileId FROM group_file where (group_file.absolutePath LIKE #{path} AND group_file.groupId = #{groupId});
